turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to get an iced Starbucks blonde black and white mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok you want an iced blonde coffee and black and white mocha.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, coconut.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: for both the iced blonde coffee and the black and white mocha?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add whipped cream to the black and white?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok what size do you want your coffees in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me place that order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and which starbucks did you want to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Portals in Washington, D.C.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok i have placed an order for a venti iced blonde coffee with coconut milk and venti black and white mocha with coconut milk at the portals in washington dc is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok great, your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: enjoy your coffee.
